always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

name: root

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"

msg.content: We're looking for a 7-day travel plan for a group of 5. We'll be departing from Provo and intend to visit 3 different cities in California from March 22nd to March 28th, 2022. We have a budget of $14,900 and require accommodations that allow parties.

We're looking for a 7-day travel plan for a group of 5. We'll be departing from Provo and intend to visit 3 different cities in California from March 22nd to March 28th, 2022. We have a budget of $14,900 and require accommodations that allow parties.

['San Diego', 'Redding', 'Sacramento', 'Fresno', 'San Luis Obispo', 'Oakland', 'Santa Barbara', 'Stockton', 'Santa Rosa', 'Bakersfield', 'Santa Ana', 'Santa Maria', 'San Jose', 'Burbank', 'Arcata', 'Butte', 'Palm Springs', 'Los Angeles', 'Long Beach', 'San Francisco', 'Monterey']
msg.name: city_search

msg.content: ['San Diego', 'Redding', 'Sacramento', 'Fresno', 'San Luis Obispo', 'Oakland', 'Santa Barbara', 'Stockton', 'Santa Rosa', 'Bakersfield', 'Santa Ana', 'Santa Maria', 'San Jose', 'Burbank', 'Arcata', 'Butte', 'Palm Springs', 'Los Angeles', 'Long Beach', 'San Francisco', 'Monterey']
msg.name: city_search

msg.content:
# California Road Trip Adventure

## Day 1: San Francisco

Welcome to your California adventure! On the first day, fly from Provo to San Francisco, where you can explore the city's iconic landmarks and vibrant culture. Check into a party-friendly accommodation like the Pier 2620 Hotel Fisherman's Wharf or the San Francisco Proper Hotel, which offer spacious rooms and vibrant social scenes.

## Day 2: San Francisco to Monterey
On the second day, take a scenic drive along the Pacific Coast Highway to Monterey. Enjoy the breathtaking views and make a stop at the famous Monterey Bay Aquarium. In the evening, stay at the Portola Hotel & Spa, a luxurious option with a lively atmosphere and easy access to the city's nightlife.

## Day 3: Monterey to San Luis Obispo
On day three, head south to San Luis Obispo. Visit the historic Mission San Luis Obispo de Tolosa and explore the charming downtown area. Book a stay at the Apple Farm Inn, a cozy inn with a relaxing atmosphere and easy-going vibe, perfect for groups.

## Day 4: San Luis Obispo to Santa Barbara
Day four takes you to Santa Barbara, known for its beautiful beaches and Spanish-style architecture. Check out the Santa Barbara Zoo and take a stroll along the waterfront. Consider staying at the Hotel Milo Santa Barbara, a modern boutique hotel with a lively pool scene and great amenities.

## Day 5: Santa Barbara to Los Angeles
Explore Los Angeles on day five. Visit the Hollywood Walk of Fame, take a tour of Universal Studios, and enjoy the vibrant nightlife. The Hollywood Roosevelt Hotel offers a great location and party-friendly atmosphere with live music and a rooftop pool.

## Day 6: Los Angeles to San Diego
On day six, travel to San Diego, a city known for its stunning coastline and sunny weather. Visit Balboa Park and the San Diego Zoo. Stay at the Hard Rock Hotel San Diego, a rock-themed hotel with a lively bar and restaurant.

## Day 7: San Diego
On your last day, continue exploring San Diego. Visit the USS Midway Museum and relax on the beaches of La Jolla. You can also enjoy a sunset cruise to end your trip on a high note.

This 7-day itinerary offers a mix of city exploration, natural beauty, and fun activities, all while accommodating your party size and budget. Enjoy your California adventure!

# California Road Trip Adventure

## Day 1: San Francisco

Welcome to your California adventure! On the first day, fly from Provo to San Francisco, where you can explore the city's iconic landmarks and vibrant culture. In the evening, stay at the Portola Hotel & Spa, a luxurious option with a lively atmosphere and easy access to the city's nightlife.

## Day 3: Monterey to San Luis Obispo
On day three, head south to San Luis Obispo. Visit the historic Mission San Luis Obispo de Tolosa and explore the charming downtown area. Book a stay at the Apple Farm Inn, a cozy inn with a relaxing atmosphere and easy-going vibe, perfect for groups.

## Day 4: San Luis Obispo to Santa Barbara
Day four takes you to Santa Barbara, known for its beautiful beaches and Spanish-style architecture. Check out the Santa Barbara Zoo and take a stroll along the waterfront. Consider staying at the Hotel Milo Santa Barbara, a modern boutique hotel with a lively pool scene and great amenities.

## Day 5: Santa Barbara to Los Angeles
Explore Los Angeles on day five. Visit the Hollywood Walk of Fame, take a tour of Universal Studios, and enjoy the vibrant nightlife. The Hollywood Roosevelt Hotel offers a great location and party-friendly atmosphere with live music and a rooftop pool.

## Day 6: Los Angeles to San Diego
On day six, travel to San Diego, a city known for its stunning coastline and sunny weather. Visit Balboa Park and the San Diego Zoo. Stay at the Hard Rock Hotel San Diego, a rock-themed hotel with a lively bar and restaurant.

## Day 7: San Diego
